title: Episode #1: What Have The Romans Ever Done For Us?
itunes:author: History Is Sexy
itunes:summary:
Join Dr Emma Southon and Janina Matthewson as they examine the impact of Roman conquest, both on the conquered peoples and how we view Rome in the modern world.
